mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE ( L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , L_ENROLL_DATE , L_MODIFY_DATE , L_STATUS , LC_NO , LT_NO , L_CONTENT ) VALUES ( 12 , #{lTitle} , #{lThumbnail} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{lcNo} , #{ltNo} , #{lContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE WHERE L_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , LC_NAME , LT_NAME , L_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, L.* FROM(SELECT * FROM LECTURE O JOIN LECTURE_CLASSIFICATION C1 ON(O.LC_NO = C1.LC_NO) JOIN LECTURE_TARGET C2 ON(O.LT_NO = C2.LT_NO) WHERE L_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY L_NO DESC) L ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL , LC_NO , LT_NO , L_CONTENT FROM LECTURE WHERE L_NO=#{lNo}
SELECT L_NO , L_TITLE , L_THUMBNAIL FROM LECTURE WHERE L_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY L_NO DESC

SELECT INSTRUCTOR_NO , INSTRUCTOR_NAME , PROFILE_PHOTO , BIRTH_DATE , INSTRUCTOR_PHONE , CAREER FROM INSTRUCTOR WHERE INSTRUCTOR_NO NOT IN(SELECT INSTRUCTOR_NO FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION WHERE (TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN LR_START_DATE AND LR_END_DATE OR TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN LR_START_DATE AND LR_END_DATE) AND #{day} = LR_DAY AND (#{startTime} BETWEEN LR_START_TIME AND LR_END_TIME OR #{endTime} BETWEEN LR_START_TIME AND LR_END_TIME))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_REGISTRATION ( LR_NO , LR_CAPACITY , LR_COUNT , LR_START_DATE , LR_END_DATE , LR_NUMBER , LR_DAY , LR_START_TIME , LR_END_TIME , LR_ENROLL_DATE , LR_MODIFY_DATE , LR_STATUS , INSTRUCTOR_NO , L_NO , LR_FEE ) VALUES ( SEQ_LR_NO.NEXTVAL , #{lrCapacity} , DEFAULT , TO_DATE(#{lrStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#{lrEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{lrNumber} , #{lrDay} , #{lrStartTime} , #{lrEndTime} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , #{instructorNo} , #{lNo} , TO_CHAR(#{lrFee}, '99,999') )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION WHERE LR_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT LR_NO , LC_NAME , LT_NAME , L_TITLE , INSTRUCTOR_NAME , LR_MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , L.LR_NO , L.LC_NAME , L.LT_NAME , L.L_TITLE , L.INSTRUCTOR_NAME , L.LR_MODIFY_DATE FROM(SELECT C3.LR_NO , C1.LC_NAME , C2.LT_NAME , O.L_TITLE , C4.INSTRUCTOR_NAME , C3.LR_MODIFY_DATE FROM LECTURE O JOIN LECTURE_CLASSIFICATION C1 ON(O.LC_NO = C1.LC_NO) JOIN LECTURE_TARGET C2 ON(O.LT_NO = C2.LT_NO) JOIN LECTURE_REGISTRATION C3 ON(O.L_NO = C3.L_NO) JOIN INSTRUCTOR C4 ON(C3.INSTRUCTOR_NO = C4.INSTRUCTOR_NO) WHERE C3.LR_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY C3.LR_NO DESC) L ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT LR_NO , LR_CAPACITY , LR_COUNT , LR_START_DATE , LR_END_DATE , LR_NUMBER , LR_DAY , LR_START_TIME , LR_END_TIME , LR_STATUS , INSTRUCTOR_NO , L_NO , LR_FEE , L_TITLE , INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM (SELECT LR_NO , LR_CAPACITY , LR_COUNT , TO_CHAR(LR_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LR_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(LR_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LR_END_DATE , LR_NUMBER , LR_DAY , LR_START_TIME , LR_END_TIME , LR_STATUS , C2.INSTRUCTOR_NO , O.L_NO , TO_NUMBER(LR_FEE, '999,999,999') LR_FEE , L_TITLE , INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM LECTURE O JOIN LECTURE_REGISTRATION C1 ON(O.L_NO = C1.L_NO) JOIN INSTRUCTOR C2 ON(C1.INSTRUCTOR_NO = C2.INSTRUCTOR_NO) WHERE LR_STATUS = 'N' AND LR_NO = #{lrNo} )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION WHERE L_NO = #{lNo} AND LR_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LECTURE_REGISTRATION WHERE (LR_COUNT = 0 OR SYSDATE > LR_END_DATE) AND LR_NO = #{lrNo}
